p: Vitamin E (Alpha Tocopherol) is a product of Embassy pharmaceuticals, Nigeria. High purity (< 99.7 %) Nitrobenzene was obtained from BDH chemical Poole England. Methanol, all other chemicals and reagents are of analytical grade obtained from both Sigma-Aldrich Co. St Louis, Missouri, USA and Analar BDH Limited, Poole, England.
